评论概述: Stylish and Versatile Coordinate Outfit Perfect for Any Occasion
评论详情: I recently bought this outfit, which includes a tank top and pants, and I'm thoroughly impressed. This coordinate outfit features a sleek, modern and sophisticated look. I purchased black.  Design and Style: The outfit has a trendy design. It is a relaxed fit with a high neckline while the pants are wider legged with a slightly baggy appearance. Both pieces complement each other beautifully and can also be styled separately.  Material and Comfort: The fabric is both stylish and breathable. The fabric drapes well and doesn’t cling, making it comfortable to wear throughout the day. I appreciate the soft feel and the fact that it doesn't wrinkle easily.  Versatility and Functionality: This coordinate set is incredibly versatile. I’ve worn it to work and on the weekend. This pairs well with a jean coat, long sweater and either sneakers or casual dress shoes.  Durability and Performance: After several wears and washes, the outfit still looks great. The color hasn’t faded, and the fabric hasn’t lost its shape or pilled.  Price and Value: I purchased it with a coupon code, but even without the coupon code it’s a good value considering the quality and versatility.  Conclusion: This is a great addition to my wardrobe. It offers a stylish, comfortable, and versatile option that can seamlessly transition for different occasions. I highly recommend.

I loved this so much that I bought it in two colors! The material is fabulous! The outfit is stylish (I wear with a denim jacket and tennis shoes-all the compliments!), it’s comfortable enough to feel like loungewear, and the size/fit is accurate. This is not cheap material! The thickness is ideal for fall and spring transitional pieces.

This set runs large. I’m 5’6” 140 lbs, athletic build, bought size small. Top fit great, then I put on the pants, which didn’t look like I expected. They were baggier than I expected but hit at an odd length. Sad to return the shirt but hoping I can find that separately. Wish this had worked. Fabric felt good, no wrinkles, nice thickness, and cute (just not on me!).

I have purchased two of these so far because I like it so much.  You  can dress it up or you can dress it down.  The material is so soft but not too thin, just a nice weight.  I am thinking to order a third color.  If you are between sizes I suggest order next size up if you like your clothes loose.  I am a size 6 but ordered medium and I like the roomy fit.  Originally ordered small which fit, but orefer it in medium.

评论概述: Ok, but too much like PJs
评论详情: Ordered M based on other reviews, but pants way too big (for reference I'm small busted, 5'7", 140 lbs), top fit well and looks nice, can wear to work.  Pants baggy and clearly look like PJs; the gray-blue color may be partly to blame. Fabric super soft, does show some wrinkles but not deal breaker.

This has become my airplane "uniform" and I wear a jean jacket with it.  I've gotten so many compliments on this while traveling.  Feeling like pajamas, washes well and doesn't wrinkle.  Perfect weight.  And sizing is accurate.  I wear mostly medium and this is what I purchased.

评论概述: Love!!! Ordered multiple colors! Petite girl dream
评论详情: Love, love, love! Super soft fabric, perfect length for 5' self. Size guide is accurate, so order according to that. I am 5ft, 135, and have a 30" waist and 41" hips and large fits great. I am usually a medium so technically sized up. I have 2 toddlers and this is perfect, easy to throw on with no care needed. Super stylish, fabric is soft and appears to be more expensive than the price tag. Recently ordered, so not sure about longevity. Easy to throw on a cardigan or Jean jacket. I am also a teacher and it will be great for work with nice shoes and a sweater and prefect for mix and matching. It is really difficult for me to find pants that don't need hemming, so happy I found these!! Ordered navy, black, cream, red, and green.

I'm 5'6 175lbs I ordered a large for a slightly loose fit to wear for work. I have wider hips and a fuller rear, and didn't want it to be a butt hugger as if it wear spandex lol. The large was perfect. Still fitted to hip area but appropriate for work. The top fit just right, and the bottom a good fit too, though they sit slightly above the ankle. Since they have a wide-leg cut, they wouldn't work well with ankle boots or sneakers, or they might look like "high waters" at least that my opionion. They pair nicely with flip-flops. The material is soft and comfortable, like wearing pajamas. It's great for fall and spring. I dressed it up with a nice suit jacket and flats, and it looked great. I got the bluish grey color. The color was 😍. I would give it a five star if legs were at least 2 inches longer.

评论概述: Stylish, Comfortable, but Prone to Staining
评论详情: I absolutely loved the Casly Lamiit Women’s Summer 2-Piece Outfit and wore it a lot this summer. It’s super comfortable and perfect for lounging around the house. It’s also versatile—easy to dress up with a cardigan for working from home or great for traveling.  The only downside is that it seems to stain very easily, so you’ll need to be cautious while wearing it. Despite that, it’s such a comfortable and stylish set that I still highly recommend it. Just be mindful of potential stains!

This was an overnight delivery that came right on time. Based on some reviews, I had ordered an Extra Large from another seller but returned the package as the clothes were too big. I then ordered my regular Large in Navy Blue from this seller and the compliments came in all day long!  The top and pants are true to size, comfortable and nice fitting.  I haven't washed them yet so cannot say how they will hold up but some reviews state that they wash well, so that's a plus.  If I wore Medium, I'd have got more in the lighter colors as the fabric does cling to the curves, but will stick to the darker colors in Large.  Overall, a very good buy!

评论概述: Lightweight and perfect for casual or work
评论详情: Love this outfit, have gotten many compliments. Very versatile as it can be casual with sneakers or good for work with heels or loafers.  It is lightweight and brethable fabric. Sturdy pockets. I have purchased two other colors.
This outfit is very cute and comfortable. It is perfect for running errands and for lounging.

I bought a Large and the top fit perfectly, but the bottoms were a bit big, but wearable.  I would have liked them smaller, however, I cannot have a smaller top.  I will keep it because it is so comfortable and cute.  I may buy another color in Medium so I can have the bottoms fit nicer and switch out the top.  For reference, I am 5 ft. 2 and 159 pounds.  Bust 36 DD.

What's great: XL fits my 5 ft 2ish 170 lb menopausal body. Not cropped, but not too long. Super comfortable. I bought black and beige (khaki). What's not great: someone said it shows every lump and bump. It does, especially in the lighter color. I wore a biker shorts style shapewear which helped, but I could see the leg line of the shape wear. Granted, I own Econo shape wear, so maybe expensive shape wear works better. It came out of the wash with some wrinkles and fold lines that didn't come out. I haven't tried to press or steam it, yet. Recommended. Overall.b
Love this it is the third one I have purchased. Pants are really comfortable. looks very high end. true to size if in between could prob go up:}

Very soft to the skin. Got a jumpsuit from this company and was impressed with the texture of the material. I am not disappointed, and I bought this in 5 different colors. I am only going to return 1 which I didn't like, the rust color. Beautiful lounge set and can also work as casual wear, gym wear and can pass on as work outfit as well. You can also dress it up as formal wear. The black color is my favorite
The neck is slightly uncomfortable - maybe my neck is bigger than most in my size? Otherwise super cute.
Me encantó para usar en vuelo. Súper cómodo y de buena calidad.  Corre bien el tamaño mediano.

I returned this because I am not a huge fan of mock turtlenecks, but thought I try it - but this just bugged me. My problem, not the sest.  I am 5'1" 143# the large fit fine.  Top is shorter and tighter but I liked that.  Pants were not cropped on me, but did not drag ground.  I would have liked to keep it for my trip coming up. very soft and comfy.

The fabric is not cheap looking, not thin and not too thick although the price is little bit cheap. My wife said the size is accurate and fits her nicely, she is 5' and weighs 108 lbs and ordered XS. It is machine washable but washed it in cold setting.

Love this track suit so much I bought three... the  royal blue, the rust and the red wine . I live in Florida and they are lightweight, super comfortable, look put together and wash beautifully. I'm on the shorter side so I love the crop pants because the length is perfect. I'm 5'3, weigh 138 And bought the large because I wanted it super roomy and I wanted to wash it without shrinkage.
I'm 5'6 165 and the large fitted me fine. Very stylish  and the color is great. Light weight for the summer. Warm for the cool evenings.
Bought 3 sets. Good color. Easy care. Good value.
Me encantó!
The material is soft, the color is a rich vibrant red and the size and price was great
Flattering and super comfy to travel in or for a casual brunch; I bought two!

This set is fantastic. The fabric is very nice and looks much more expensive and could even be dressed up with some jewelry for a night out. It is super comfortable yet has structure that makes it look more elegant than sweatpants. I can’t comment on how well the fabric holds up with lots of wear but I will report back after a month if there is pilling. If not, I will be buying several more sets in other colors. I’m 5’5”, 36DDD, 155lbs and the large was perfect. I got the navy which is very dark and richly saturated.

This outfit is so amazing that after receiving the first order... I ordered 2 more.  This is so incredibly comfortable and can be dressed up for a night out.  I am 5'1" @ 125lb with a bust of DD.  Pants were a little long for me so I rolled over the waist band to get the desired length.

perfect for all but the very hottest or very coldest days in Southern California.  Toss a sweater over it and I should get a lot of wear out of it.  Still trying to work out some of the folds/creases from shipping.  All in all, love it.  Now if only I could find same thing but with enough sleeve to cover my bat wings. And, I need to help with styling and shoes
The pants are so good. The shirt is less good. Just not great quality and it’s short. But overall, a good buy for the price.
Perfect git. Soft material

im Petite 5"2 ~ 98#~ depends on style & brand im a size 00/0/XXS/ XS/ S ~ 24 inch waist its VERY HARD to find clothing that fits me well SURPRISINGLY this set FITS me... pants come dwn to the top of my ankles ~ bought FUSHIA size XS ~ colour was NOT fushia its a DARK BLUSH ROSE very Beautiful !! ~ fabric is buttery SOFT and a nice feel ~ i am buyin MORE!! great price PRIME deal for $20

评论概述: Perfect balance of comfy and cute
评论详情: Couldn’t believe how cute this was actually in person. So soft and comfortable. Perfect travel wear, doesn’t wrinkle. You can wear it with a sneaker or add a cute little jacket and shoe and it’s a casual workday. Liked it so much bought it in two colors.

Love the feel of the fabric and is so versatile too. If only the top was not so snug. The pants seem to be large (as ordered) and the top feels medium. Idk. I kept it and ordered a size up to have loose pants and a top that fits.
I got this on sale so definitely worth the price. Very soft and good material. I went up one size based on reviews and I’m happy i did. I’d recommend!

评论概述: Great fabric but top too tight
评论详情: I love the way the fabric feels and the length was good for my 5’3” height. The pants fit great but the top was skin tight and really short. I am of the buxom variety so that could be the problem. Otherwise a nice looking set.

评论概述: Best fit I've had for an on-line purchase
评论详情: I'm 5'2" and 130lbs.  Typically I purchase "medium" as my preferred size, but on-line purchases are generally too long in the legs or arms, too wide in the bodice or just a different shade from my computer monitor.  I have to say that I was pleasantly surprised that this outfit fit me perfectly without any alterations.  The pictures are exactly as described and the price is reasonable.  It washes well and requires little ironing.  I steam wrinkles out if necessary.I've bought two different shades and am contemplating and third.  Speedy shipment of a quality product.

I purchased this on a Labor Day sale and it was a great deal and even prettier in person. The fabric is soft and comfortable, medium weight. The color is gorgeous and much better than pictured, a burnt orange and not the garish orange pictured. I ordered a large and I'm 5'10, 160. The pants are cropped on me and about an inch shorter than the model. I do wish they were longer bu tknew they would be cropped from the picture and description. I haven't washed yet. Definitely recommend.

I am happy with my purchase.  The material is so soft and comfy. After reading many reviews I sized  up to a large since I am tall. The top is shorter than I like. I wish it was about an inch or two longer. However it was stretchy enough to keep it tuck in with a Cardigan worn over it.  If I would have sized up to an extra large the bust area would be too large as the large was a little big for me. I would love to have more colors if the top has some length added to it.
Good quality material. One pocket is smaller then the other and the top is smaller than expected
Love the look. The material is heavier than expected but I really like it. I’m very short so it’s longer on me than most.

I bought a small -- 4'11" 115 lbs -- and I could actually fold the waist over to lift the rise and get rid of some extra bagginess. The neck on the top is also a little large which ends up looking kind of sloppy, but that's probably overly picky. The package is vacuum sealed so the items are really wrinkled coming out and makes me wonder if they'll wrinkle easily in a suitcase. It's not the kind of fabric I was hoping for but it is really comfortable and lightweight.
I love this set. I bought it in two different colors. Can’t wait for the next sale!
Great for petites- crop length. Material has a nice weight and drape. Great basics to dress up or down. I'm 5ft 3, 140 lbs and size medium.

Love, love! I am a 14/16 but I am short 5’4. When it gets cooler I will wear with boots and a cardigan. The material is so soft. Washed well. I did hang to dry because I wasn’t sure it would shrink. The top is on the shorter side already. Will buy more.
Exelente, color, talla, material y la terminación.
Estoy de acuerdo con las previas reseñas,  este conjunto es muy bueno para usar en viajes.
I bought the blue, gray, and black set. They fit loose , but nice. I bought a medium, my usual size. Fits great. Nice and thick and comfy. Good material. The best travel outfits!

The best travel outfit! So comfortable. The material is so soft and breathable. I was on a 10 hour flight in this and then another 4 more hours of travel after that and I want more colors. I can mix and match the top and bottom with other things too. Win win for packing. You can’t go wrong with this! I’m 5’ 8” 135 lbs and the medium was perfect

评论概述: Everyday and all occasion cute outfit
评论详情: This is by far one of the best sets I have bought on Amazon! I cannot tell you how soft and buttery the material is...you have to get it to understand! This can go from casual to dressed up at night! Accessories are a must and the shoe game is wide open depending on your occasion! Depending on your height, the pants might be cropped or even capri if you are tall. The shirt is not short, so your midriff does not show! I wore this on an international flight recently and it was so comfy! I got so many compliments! Will definitely be wearing this and other colors for many occasions and work! Red hot alert...don't let this set pass you by!

I’m totally crushing on this green two-piece outfit that is ridiculously comfortable. I live in Florida so I don’t want material. That’s too hot and this is really lovely. I will definitely plan to travel in this because it’s like you’re wearing pajamas, but it looks really cute. I plan to layer it with a jean jacket when I’m traveling.  I am a big fan of Varley clothes but they’re harder on the budget. I like this as a substitute.  I’m wearing a size small.  I’m 5’4 and weigh 130
Perfect fit, well made and washes well. I will definitely be purchasing more in other colors.

I want to love this so much as it’s super cute and the fabric is amazing and ridiculously comfortable! But, look at these pockets! I cannot keep this color due to it. My sister has the black one and you cannot see, but I do not want black in the summer! Therefore, I do not know what other color to order??

Super cute outfit. I am 5’8” so the pants are a good length cropped. They do flare at the bottom so if you do not like that look these are not for you!!  Has pockets which I love. I got the light blue and I love it. Material is super soft. Does not wrinkle easy and is wash and go which I love. Great price for good quality!!

I love this lounge set! It’s so cute, soft and comfy. I am really short so the “cropped” length for most people is perfect for me. It’s nice around the house and you could probably wear it to the grocery store.

评论概述: Fits great on a short, petite figure
评论详情: Heard about this set from Rachel Cruze as a great airport outfit. A lot of the lengths on these sets though are usually too long on my 5'1 frame. This pant at 37 inches was perfect. The arm holes weren't too big either. For reference I am 144 and a 34 DD. The material is very comfortable. I actually bought the navy and then it went to half price so I returned it and got two instead. Would buy in more colors but not sure how much wear I will get with it in the colder months although I can just throw on a jacket.
Wore a few times but shrunk a little. If you like high waisted pants you might want to size up, short in the rise

Okay, so…this two piece set is uh-mazing! It’s ridiculously soft, and thick enough so that it’s not see-through, but thin enough to wear as a swimsuit coverup in the midst of the summer heat. It’s got some stretch to it, but feels like cotton. I ordered a medium & I’d say it fits true-to-size. Do yourself a favor, and order one in every color. {Especially while it’s on sale!} Lord knows I did, with zero regrets. 👌🏾

For reference 5ft and 195 I purchased different sizes (lrg, xl) and colors (Army Green, Navy, Black and Gray'). They all differ in fit. I kept the navy in lrg, Gray and Black in XL. Size up for comfort in the waist. The waistband is thick and tight, I love the fit, material, length and color choices. If they made clothes in 1/2 sizes like shoes! Lol, the XL are good fit. I'm pear shaped so the fit on bottom was perfect. The waist was tight except for the Gray, it's big but I can work with it. I would recccomend just size up if you want more tummy comfort.

I love the feel and fit of this set.  With this color it does show every bump and such on your legs and bum so wear a kimono or long cardi if you are self conscious about that.  It looks like a high end set because of the fabric.  I want it in more colors.  You can dress it up or dress it down!

评论概述: Size XS is more like size S in Gray
评论详情: This set in XS fits more like a Small compared to the XS in Navy/Dark blue.  Also the metal covering on the pant's drawstring came off after first wash.

评论概述: So many compliments on this outfit!
评论详情: I love this set and got so many compliments when I wore it! The color is great, and I don’t tend to wear blues a lot. It fits well and is super comfortable. Even with a very short inseam, the length was perfect for me. It hits at ankle length for me at 5’1. The material is on the thicker side so it isn’t sheer and doesn’t show any lumps or bumps. It may be too thick to wear in the dead of summer when it’s hot and humid but it’s perfect otherwise, and would make an easy, classy outfit for the office. I would definitely get more colors to have in rotation.

I order this in 4 colors and I love this set. I could have gone down to medium but I followed the reviews. For reference I am 5”2, 150 lbs, 36 DD and it’s a tad bit big. I have no hips or butt. I would recommend it.
I am 5'5, 133lbs.  Medium fits great.  Perfect cropped len gth. Comfortable, no huge arm holes, soft/stretchy, pockets.  What's not to love.
The quality is exceptional and love the soft material!

Just received this set & so very happy with it.  I had to return the XS & ordered the  medium instead .  For reference I’m 5’2” & 115 lbs.  the pants are longer on me which was perfect!  Material is soft & lightweight and very comfy.  Can be dressed up or down.  I also ordered the Black Set Medium.  Highly recommend!
This outfit is super cute and comfy.  The fabric is the best!  I get tons of complements whenever I wear it.  I usually get size Large because I don't like anything fitted.  This fits great!

You found what you’ve been looking for!This is the perfect travel outfit.  The fit, the color, the softness.  Truly feels like silky pjs and perfect for a long flight, or short flight, whatever you need it for.  I’m in between sizes so went the bigger route just in case of shrinkage or whatever…5’6 at 150 lbs - Large fits perfect, I’m sure even better after a wash..

I’m impressed with the quality of the fabric and fit . I recd the black and loved the fit that I ordered another one . 5’ft and 124 and fits perfectly . Size medium.. a little on the hippy side and wanted a loose fit

I like this lounge set for the price! It’s soft and comfy. I’m 5’5, 145lbs and got a large - I could have worn medium but who wants a tight lounge set? The top is def cropped so sizing up helped with that as well. Wish the turtleneck had more support (flops) or wasn’t even there so deducted a star.
Very comfortable!!
Está bonito. Solo que el color es un poco diferente al que se ve.
I loved this. Soft and fit was accurate.
This is a great color, I chose the pink, for Breast Cancer Awareness Month. The outfit is comfortable and flattering.
Me sentí muy cómoda y fresca el día que lo utilice. La talla es perfecta M.

This set is so much better than expected. It fits perfectly, can be dressed up or down, is seriously soft, and seems to be a good quality. I found that it was true to size. I love it so much that I just bought it in another color.

Have this set from another seller and absolutely love everything about it. Ordered in orange. It’s a beautiful shade of orange, fabric same as the previously purchased set but the top was either missed sized or cut extremely small. Ordered in medium, top looks like an extra small. It would be a 5⭐️ review if it wasn’t for the sizing of the top. Returned.
I ordered a small, fits great and it is still short in legs which I wanted.  Can wear for casual, planning on wearing it on plane to Europe, or can dress up for dinner.
Love this two piece! It’s so easy!! You just put it on and you look so out together. Cute with sandals or tennis. Blue Jean jacket or workout! The possibilities are endless! Great buy
The material has a cooling quality to it. I usually wear a small and this is true to size. I'm 5'2 and this fits me perfectly.

This is a very comfortable and nice looking set. Relaxing feel, but looks as though you are dressed, rather than just hanging out in sweats!  The pants are a bit heavy feeling after awhile, but otherwise, easy to wear.
These are so comfy and flattering; great for traveling.  I bought 6 different colors.
Love the feel, very comfortable.  I got a medium and usually get small.  I really probably would have felt better in large so sizing is off.
Cute lil outfit, but I should have went down a size smaller, I lost weight LOL Even after a wash it stayed the same size. Will buy more colors
I really liked this 2 piece outfit.  The material feels buttery soft and is super comfortable to wear.  I'm 5" and the pant length is exactly what I was looking for.

I was really hoping this set would work.  I love my Spa**x set and was wanting to find a good dupe at a more reasonable price point.  First the pros:  super soft, quality fabric, saturated color.The cons: the pockets add more bulk and right at the widest point of my hips. For reference, I’m a pear shape at 5’3”, 145lbs.  The widest point of my hips is 41” and my waist is 29”.Again, great quality, just not a good fit for me.

I loved it in areas such as the front and the top was perfect, but the pants are like high waters on me (I am 5’4) and fabric shows underwear lines. I will return. They need to make pants another 2 inches at bottom of legs to make these work and that change would make me give 5 stars.
I love the material and the feel, but the XS pants were too short and looked a bit ridiculous.  I am 5'4", so not that tall.  Unfortunately I will have to return them.

评论概述: Great - if you get one that fits
评论详情: I ordered this set in black in XL and L, the L fit great.  Went back and ordered blue in L, and it fits about a size smaller than the black.  I absolutely love the black L.  Especially the pants.

The fabric is sturdy. It’s not thin and flimsy. I don’t know if it’s hot though and I hate things that make me feel hot. , especially in the summer. I bought these specifically for travel and they did the trick. They don’t wrinkle and are super cute with slides or tennis shoes. Fit was a little looks and I’m a size 8, 5’3, 150 lbs.

I love the fabric but out of the 4 sets I ordered only one was the correct fit. I don’t know why some of the sizes are true to size so for me out of the 4 I ordered only 1 fit correctly. Otherwise very comfortable
I have this in 3 colors!  Perfect for travel! So soft! Washes great.  Love them!
Product is as described. Great look for work or leisure.

评论概述: Classy 2 piece outfit with wide leg pants- great value
评论详情: Love the fabric! Definitely wrinkle free. Can be dressed up or worn casually by itself. Great value! Want one in another color now!
Good quality
I was skeptical but the color is perfect and the material feels much more expensive. Washes great too.
I absolutely love this outfit and get so many compliments on it.

I was hesitant to buy this outfit due to the price being so good...but an influencer I follow who chooses only high quality stuff insisted it was great.  Well it is!!!  So comfortable - great length for my 5'3" height.  Only issues, because I am 170-175lbs and 36DD/38DD I  needed the XXL.. The armholes will need to be slightly altered as well as the neck if that can be done - it fits too loose.  But for the price and comfort any minor alterations will be worth it!  Will report back if it doesn't hold up well after washing.
I bought this for an upcoming trip but wore it at home to try it out. Very cute and comfortable. You can dress it up or down.
Casual or dressy but so comfy. True to size. Love this set. Easy to travel with. Light and stays wrinkle free with minimal effort
